EmailTemplate.name: 17.AMS.SmallCell.none.N.G.N.17207.Small Cells Campaign 2017.Email 2 - Service 4
EmailTemplate.subject: Small cells bring super-fast services to ski fans
EmailTemplate.textOnly: ${preheader} View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> How to achieve 100 percent availability when it really matters When high-profile events need high-class mobile broadband, you need small cells. Nokia experts helped Telekom Austria make the most of our Flexi Zone solution at the Skiing World Cup to deliver top network performance under high-load and extreme winter conditions. Connect with us © {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia. Contact us <[[{{my.ContactUs}}]]> | Privacy policy <[[{{my.PrivacyPolicy}}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> You are receiving this email because you've subscribed to receive information from Nokia.
